article.title: Self-fulfillment versus ego
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: Everyone has a desire for some abstract "more". The trick is to figure out which of these desires are healthy.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
